Text: Fiserv believes that this business combination makes sense from the complementary assets between the two companies, projecting higher revenue growth than it would achieve on its own and costs savings of about $900 million over five years.
Cause: Fiserv believes that this business combination makes sense from the complementary assets between the two companies
Effect: projecting higher revenue growth than it would achieve on its own and costs savings of about $900 million over five years.
Sentence: <e1>Fiserv believes that this business combination makes sense from the complementary assets between the two companies</e1>, <e2>projecting higher revenue growth than it would achieve on its own and costs savings of about $900 million over five years.</e2>
